instructions.label: ON THIS LABEL SHOULD TAKE THE TEST ONLY THE PERSON WHOSE NAME APPEARS

addressChange.applyTo: Does the change apply to you or just to all family members on label?

instructions.addressChangeDetails: If Address Changed: What is your (Please include area code.)

message.content: With this ballot I am enclosing six packs of cigarettes coded as follows: -3 packs. Please read the directions for each part carefully and pay special attention when judging these cigarettes--we will be sending you a free carton of the test cigarette you choose in Part III.
message.closing: Thank you very much--your cooperation in this test is most helpful.

testInstructions.firstStep: FIRST SMOKE ONE OR TWO PACKS OF THE CIGARETTES CODED
testInstructions.phrases: Read the phrases at each end of each line of boxes. Which phrase do you think describes the cigarette coded

scale.left: the left side--the more you think the description is true the closer to the left side.
scale.right: If you think side--again the surer it is the closer to the right side.

mildTaste.negative: Does not have a mild taste.

goodTaste.negative: Does not have a good taste

draw.negative: Does not have an easy draw

dryTaste.negative: Does not have a dry taste in the mouth
dryTaste.positive: Has a dry taste in the mouth

aftertaste.negative: Does not leave a good aftertaste in my mouth
aftertaste.positive: Leaves a good aftertaste in my mouth
